grigg_advantage.application_notes: Liquid foliar fertilizer with chelated Mn and Zn. Apply 3-6 fl oz per 1000 sq ft every 2 weeks. Contains BRANDT iHammer Technology. No phosphate. Nutrients derived from potassium nitrate, urea, sodium borate, manganese EDTA, sodium molybdate, and zinc EDTA. Compatible with most fertilizers, pesticides and adjuvants.

grigg_carboplex.application_notes: Contains three sources of nitrogen, phosphate, potassium, amino acid complexed micronutrients and sea plant extract (Ascophyllum nodosum). Apply 6-12 fl oz/1000 sq ft on greens/tees, 9-12 fl oz/1000 sq ft on fairways every 7-14 days. Excellent for winter turfgrass preparation. Derived from monoammonium phosphate, potassium nitrate, urea, iron/manganese/zinc amino acid complexes, potassium hydroxide, and kelp.

grigg_garys_green.application_notes: Flagship product of GRIGG Proven Foliar Nutrient line. Contains three sources of N, P, K and amino acid complexed micronutrients. Apply 6-9 fl oz/1000 sq ft for cool season, 9-12 fl oz/1000 sq ft for warm season every 7-14 days. Also available phosphate-free. Widely used as primary N source for spoon feeding programs. Derived from urea ammonium nitrate, monoammonium phosphate, urea, potassium citrate, and amino acid complexes.

grigg_garys_green_ultra.application_notes: Combines GRIGG Gary's Green and GRIGG Ultraplex formulations. Apply 6-12 fl oz/1000 sq ft cool season, 9-15 fl oz/1000 sq ft warm season every 7-14 days. Contains Ascophyllum nodosum kelp extract and 0.25% Yucca schidigera. Also available phosphate-free. Derived from urea ammonium nitrate, monoammonium phosphate, potassium nitrate, urea, potassium citrate, and amino acid complexes.

grigg_kelplex.application_notes: Contains three sources of nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, amino acid complexed iron and sea plant extract (Ascophyllum nodosum). Apply 1-3 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Derived from urea, monoammonium phosphate, potassium nitrate, iron amino acid complex, and kelp. Excellent biostimulant for stress management.

grigg_manganese_combo.application_notes: Amino acid complexed multi-nutrient with 5% Mn, plus Cu, Mg and Zn. Apply 1-3 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Excellent for improving turf color and correcting micronutrient deficiencies. Derived from magnesium, copper, manganese, and zinc amino acid complexes.

grigg_megalex.application_notes: Liquid foliar formulation for building strong, green, vibrant turf. Contains BRANDT iHammer Technology. Apply 2.5-3 fl oz/1000 sq ft weekly OR 4-6 fl oz/1000 sq ft every other week. No phosphate. Effective in both sun and shade areas. Derived from urea. May help with green speed management.

grigg_micro_burst.application_notes: Multi-nutrient micronutrient formulation with amino acid complexed Fe, Mn, Cu, and Zn plus boron and molybdenum. Apply 2-4 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Excellent for improving turf color and correcting micronutrient deficiencies. Derived from potassium citrate, sodium borate, copper/iron/manganese/zinc amino acid complexes, and sodium molybdate.

grigg_nutra_green.application_notes: High phosphate (10%) multi-nutrient formulation. Apply 3-9 fl oz/1000 sq ft cool season, 4-10 fl oz/1000 sq ft warm season every 7-14 days. Recommended for spring green up, overseeding and aeration. Excellent on sand-based root zones where P availability is an issue. Derived from monoammonium phosphate, urea ammonium nitrate, potassium citrate, and amino acid complexes.

grigg_pk_plus.application_notes: High potassium (17%) multi-nutrient with two sources of phosphorus (phosphate and phosphite). Apply 6 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days. Excellent for spring green up and winter turfgrass preparation. Contains cobalt. Derived from monoammonium phosphate, urea, potassium phosphite, sodium borate, cobalt sulfate, and sodium molybdate.

grigg_kal_b.application_notes: Calcium-focused formulation with 10% Ca, N, K, B and silicon dioxide. Apply 3-6 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Calcium is important for cell wall strength. Excellent for sand-based root zones low in available calcium. Contains 0.015% Silicon Dioxide (SiO2). Derived from potassium nitrate, urea, calcium amino acid complex, sodium borate, and sodium silicate.

grigg_tuff_turf.application_notes: High potassium (14%) formulation with amino acid complexed Mg and Fe. Apply 3-6 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Contains 0.015% Silicon Dioxide (SiO2). High levels of available potassium for stress management. Derived from potassium nitrate, urea, potassium citrate, magnesium amino acid complex, iron amino acid complex, and sodium silicate.

grigg_ultraplex.application_notes: Proprietary multi-nutrient with sea plant extract and wetting agent (0.8% Yucca schidigera). Apply 3-6 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Contains Ascophyllum nodosum kelp. Non-ionic surfactant reduces water surface tension. Derived from potassium nitrate, urea, and amino acid complexes for Mg, Cu, Fe, Mn, and Zn.

grigg_upplause_plus.application_notes: 10% liquid nitrogen fertilizer with BRANDT iHammer Technology. Apply 3-6 fl oz/1000 sq ft at least twice monthly. Stable nitrogen source that resists soil tie-up. Effective in both sun and shade areas. May help with green speed management. Derived from ammonium sulfate and urea.

grigg_rezadone.application_notes: Biological thatch and black layer management product containing 5 Bacillus species (total 5.55x10^8 CFU/ml). Contains 35% surfactant, 5% organic acids, 5% dispersant agents, and 1% fulvic acid. For thatch: 12.8 fl oz/acre every 14-28 days. For black layer: 5 fl oz/1000 sq ft every 30-60 days. Accelerates organic matter decomposition.

grigg_ck_balance.application_notes: GreenSpec greens-grade micro-granular with 24% K2O, 18% Ca, 8% S. Apply 3-6 lbs/1000 sq ft as needed. Small particle size passes through 200 mesh sieve. Contains 36% calcium carbonate equivalent. Derived from sulfate of potash and calcium carbonate. Recommended for monthly in-season use.

grigg_seven_iron.application_notes: Flagship GreenSpec granular with 1:1:1 NPK ratio plus 7% Fe and 7% S. Apply 7-14 lbs/1000 sq ft as needed. Contains ferrous sulfate, sea plant extract (Ascophyllum nodosum), and 2.5% humic acid. Recommended for pre-plant/starter applications. Also available in fairway grade. Derived from monoammonium phosphate, urea, soybean meal, sulfate of potash, gypsum, ferrous sulfate, and iron/manganese/zinc sucrates.

grigg_turf_rally.application_notes: GreenSpec granular with four N sources including methylene urea slow-release. Apply 3-6 lbs/1000 sq ft. Slow-release N provides even feeding up to 12 weeks. Contains iron sucrate, kelp extract, and 2.5% humic acid. Also available phosphorus-free and in fairway grade. Derived from ammonium sulfate, monoammonium phosphate, urea, methylene urea, soybean meal, sulfate of potash, gypsum, calcium carbonate, and sucrate micronutrients.

grigg_greenpig.application_notes: Premium turf pigment additive for actively growing turf. Provides natural green color for up to one month. Reflects NIR light which may improve turfgrass quality. Greens: 12-24 fl oz/acre, fairways: 18-32 fl oz/acre, sports fields: 24-34 fl oz/acre in 50-100 gal water. Do NOT apply to dormant turf. Less abrasive on spray pumps than paint. Excellent alternative to overseeding.

grigg_greenpig_ultra.application_notes: Premium pigment for darker green color on dormant and semi-dormant turf. Provides color for up to one month. Greens: 12-24 fl oz/acre, fairways: 18-32 fl oz/acre, sports fields: 24-34 fl oz/acre in 50-100 gal water. Approved for use on dormant and semi-dormant turfgrass. Less abrasive on spray pumps than paint.
